subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[advance]]; to [[increase]]
# to [[promote]]
# {{zh-div|國}} Chinese [[feudal]] state of [[Jin]] (11th century BCE–376 BCE), a state of the Zhou Dynasty in northern China
# {{zh-div|朝}} Chinese [[w:Jin Dynasty (265–420)|Jin]] [[dynasty]] (265-420)
# 35th [[hexagram]] of the [[I Ching]]
# {{zh-alt-name|山西|[[Shanxi]]}}
